mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(emp_no, title, content, fix) VALUES(#{emp_no},#{title},#{content},#{fix})
mapper.select: SELECT n.n_idx, n.title, n.reg_date, n.hit, e.position FROM notice n LEFT JOIN emp e on n.emp_no = e.emp_no ORDER BY n_idx DESC

SELECT n.title, n.reg_date, n.content, e.position, e.emp_no, w.new_photo_name FROM notice n LEFT JOIN emp e ON n.emp_no = e.emp_no LEFT JOIN wphoto w ON n.n_idx = w.board_num WHERE n.n_idx = #{param1}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET hit = hit +1 WHERE n_idx = #{param1}
